title: Create romantic proposal web page for Nibtahil

requirements.text: Create a romantic-themed landing page that asks 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' with pink and white color scheme

quotes: Create an interactive web page as a surprise for my girlfriend

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays the question 'Nibtahil, will you be mine?' prominently
Pink and white color scheme is applied throughout the design

requirements.text: Add two interactive buttons labeled 'Yes' and 'No' with the No button moving away randomly when the user hovers over it

quotes: There should be two options: Yes or No
When she hovers her cursor over No, it should move away so she cannot click it, forcing her to click only on Yes

acceptanceCriteria: No button moves to a random position when hovered over
No button cannot be clicked due to hover behavior
Yes button remains stationary and clickable

requirements.text: Display the uploaded romantic emoji image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) when the Yes button is clicked

quotes: When she clicks Yes, show her a image given also no changing in image use this excet

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Yes button displays the uploaded image
The exact uploaded image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) is shown without modifications
Image is displayed prominently and clearly

requirements.text: Ensure the page is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile devices (iPad and phones) using Chrome browser

quotes: so that I can easily run it on my iPad or in phone both using Chrome

acceptanceCriteria: Page is responsive and adapts to mobile screen sizes
All interactive elements work correctly on touch devices
Page renders properly in Chrome on iPad and phones
Button hover behavior is adapted for touch interactions

requirements.text: Render the uploaded romantic emoji image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated
Image is accessible for display in the frontend

constraints: Use the exact uploaded image (431bcc9e2ede8fba6459866eea92d85f.jpg) without modifications
Use pink and white color scheme as specified by the user
Ensure mobile compatibility for iPad and phone Chrome browsers
nonGoals: Adding backend functionality or data persistence
Adding animations beyond the No button movement behavior
